name: Kopin Corporation
description: Kopin Corporation is a leading developer and provider of innovative display and imaging technologies primarily focused on the military, industrial, and consumer markets. Founded in 1984 and headquartered in Westborough, Massachusetts, Kopin specializes in miniature displays, optics, and advanced technologies that enable small, lightweight, and high-performance devices. The company's products are widely used in head-mounted displays, augmented reality (AR), virtual reality (VR), and wearable devices, making them integral to applications in defense, medical, and industrial sectors. With a strong emphasis on research and development, Kopin has pioneered several technologies including microdisplays and high-resolution imaging solutions that enhance user experiences in various applications. The company also offers a range of semiconductor technologies that complement its display products. Kopin's commitment to innovation and quality positions it as a key player in the growing fields of AR and VR, as well as in the broader context of IoT (Internet of Things) applications. With a mission to drive forward the next generation of immersive display technology, Kopin continues to expand its capabilities and market reach through strategic partnerships and collaborations.
